alert.note: Alert for Grainger (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 24 at 1:46PM CST until February 24 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall earlier today. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Cocke, Grainger, Greene, Hamblen, Hawkins, Jefferson, Sullivan and Washington. * WHEN...Until 545 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water continues to cover some roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 241 PM EST, Runoff and drainage from the heavier rainfall that occurred earlier today will continue to produce minor flooding for the next few hours in some areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Morristown, Bristol Tn, Greeneville, Elizabethton, Jefferson City, Rogersville, Dandridge, Rutledge, Jonesborough, Bean Station, Tusculum, White Pine, Surgoinsville, New Market, Baneberry, Russellville, Colonial Heights and Gray. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
